title: JAAL 1.1 node
description: Generic data structure for an array cell, a list node, a tree node, and a graph node.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node among all data structures.

key.description: Primary data inside the node. If the type is string, it may also be an identifier of a graph, matrix, or node defined elsewhere.

legend.description: A text to be displayed aside the node.

style.description: Graphical style of the node: a name of a style definition.
